phome: A company that combines experience in the supply of communication IT solutions together with new flexi solutions for security management of IT solutions for cities and municipalities.
pabout: We are a company that can advise and help in the design and implementation of your IT solutions. We draw on the experience we have gathered from our partners and offer them to you.
question: Who we are?
card1t: Our solutions are built on years of proven technology that solves problems related to security and access to the facility. The basis for property protection is always a high-quality alarm that ensures that no unauthorized person enters the protected building.
card2t: The goal of our company is to ensure the supply of computer network comprehensively, metallic, optical, wireless. This means from network solution design, delivery and implementation, to network management itself
card3t: Based on customer requirements and our experience, we are able to prepare the most suitable design of camera monitoring solution according to needs and specifications with the possibility of expanding the alarm system in the future. In our offer you will find a wide range of monitoring and security devices.
card4t: An integrative smart platform for cities and municipalities that want to be innovative.
name: ORION-trus s.r.o.
